message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,750? I'm willing to make a serious decision at this price.
